attributes.action: Car Insurance Companys to fit smart dash cameras to cars, to reduce Premiums
attributes.additional_details:
My sister in law was involved in a car accident which wasn't her fault. Unfortunately due to no witness's she is now liable for a 50/50 claim.  A £450 excess was payable due to no fault of her own and potential for increased insurance premium.

Some benefits of smart dash cams below;

- Video evidence present to assist with an insurance claim.
- Ability to record via GPS the speed at which a car was travelling, to remove the likely hood of a whiplash claim
attributes.background: With increasing Car insurance premiums for millions of people in the UK  for accidents and whiplash claims, I've started this petition to highlight the benefits for car insurers to install smart dash cameras.

rejection.details:
The decision as to whether or not car insurance companies fit smart dash cameras to cars is one to be taken by insurance  companies, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178272
